recipe.title: Kid-Friendly Peanut Sauce
ingredients: 2 tablespoons low-sodium soy sauce or tamari
instructions: Blend peanut butter, vinegar, soy, sesame oil, honey, and 3/4 cup warm water in a blender until smooth. Add salt to taste, if desired.
Do Ahead Sauce can be made 2 weeks ahead. Transfer to an airtight container and chill.
Sauce can be made 2 weeks ahead. Transfer to an airtight container and chill.
